ygData.subject: Re: Listing of data gathered from postings
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi David, I disabled attachments from this list, since attachments can inadvertantly send viruses to other people.  Hopefully you can take what you write in
ygData.messageBody:
Hi David,

I disabled attachments from this list, since attachments can inadvertantly
send viruses to other people. Hopefully you can take what you write in
word or whatever, and cut and paste it into yoru email program to send the
information.

- Christina

On Mon, 26 Jul 1999, David Lari wrote:

> From: David Lari <kerik@...>
>
> Well, I've gone through about 80 postings and here's what I have put together from
> what people have posted. Please feel free to send me additional info and I will
> update and send out periodically.
>
> This is all gathered from postings you folks have put up, but for any reason, should
> you want to be removed from this listing, just let me know.
>
> I have probably missed some info, but this would seem to be a good start. Please
> don't be offended if I left you out. Just send me the info. and I'll put it in.
>
> Hugs,
> David
>
>
> [Attachments have been removed from this message]
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
> Having difficulty getting "in synch" with list members?
> http://www.onelist.com
> Try ONElist's Shared Calendar to organize events, meetings and more!
